name: At the Hedges of Time
description:
Help Sir Montaclé escape the hedge maze and free himself from the witch's curse! Use your ability to rewind time to solve mind-bending puzzles in an interconnected world. 

---

Link for mobile: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=2fad7fdd93a1a9d6f689024baeb84f5b

---

This game was created entirely using vanilla PuzzleScript at https://www.puzzlescript.net/
